Title: God Forgives... I Don't!
Writer: Giuseppe Colizzi (screenplay), Giuseppe Colizzi (story), Gumersindo Mollo (screenplay), Gumersindo Mollo (story)
Actors: Terence Hill, Frank Wolff, Bud Spencer, Gina Rovere
Plot: After a train is robbed of its payroll, an insurance agent and a card-shark team-up to retrieve the loot from the bandits who guard it at a secret location near the Mexican border.
